forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High around 20C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High 68F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 20C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 68F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 16C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 62F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 62F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 19C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 66F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 64F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 63F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 17C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 64F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 64F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 18C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 65F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 10C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low around 50F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
